titleInfo.title: Blueprint of Rough Sketch Map Showing Approximate Area of Morrah Tribal 'Dira', from Baduin Sources

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Blueprint of a map by Harold Richard Patrick Dickson, Lieutenant-Colonel, Political Agent to Kuwait. Shows the area occupied by the Al Murrah tribe and the approximate location of the other major tribes across the region with major towns and Bertram Thomasâ€™ route across Al Khali (Empty Quarter) marked.
